00034 new_process_orders_t* make_orders(const char* Where, fs_node_t* fromWhere)
00035 {
00036         new_process_orders_t* nOrders = malloc(sizeof(new_process_orders_t));
00037         memset(nOrders, 0, sizeof(new_process_orders_t));
00038         nOrders->Filename = malloc(strlen(Where) + 1);
00039         strcpy(nOrders->Filename, Where);
00040         
00041         nOrders->fromWhere = fromWhere;
00042 }
00043 
00044 void free_orders(new_process_orders_t* orders)
00045 {
00046         free(orders->Filename);
00047         free(orders);
00048 }

00053 void new_process_entry()
00054 {
00055         process_message Msg = postbox_top(&getCurrentProcess()->m_processPostbox);
00056 
00057         if (Msg.ID == LOAD_MESSAGE)
00058         {
00059                 int usrMode = 0;
00060 
00061                 DEBUG_PRINT("Valid message. continue to load\n");
00062                 new_process_orders_t* Orders = (new_process_orders_t*) Msg.messageAdditionalData;
00063 
00064                 DEBUG_PRINT("Telling system to attempt to run %s\n", Orders->Filename);
00065 
00066                 fs_node_t* Node = evaluatePath(Orders->Filename, Orders->fromWhere);
00067 
00068                 DEBUG_PRINT("Attempted to evaluate path\n");
00069 
00070                 usrMode = Orders->user_mode;
00071 
00072                 DEBUG_PRINT("Renaming process\n");
00073                 rename_current_process(Orders->Filename);
00074 
00075                 DEBUG_PRINT("User mode toggle checked\n");
00076 
00077                 free_orders(Orders);
00078 
00079                 DEBUG_PRINT("Orders freed\n");
00080 
00081                 if (Node == 0)
00082                 {
00083                         DEBUG_PRINT("Unable to evaluate node. process could not load file specified\n");
00084                         schedulerKillCurrentProcess();
00085                 } else
00086                 {
00087                         DEBUG_PRINT("Passing to executable loader\n");
00088                         loadAndExecuteElf(Node, usrMode);
00089                 }
00090         }
00091         else
00092         {
00093                 DEBUG_PRINT("Invalid message. Killing self\n");
00094         }
00095 
00096         for (;;) { }
00097 }

00099 process_t* initializeKernelProcess()
00100 {
00101         disable_interrupts();
00102         if (kernel_proc != 0) return kernel_proc;
00103 
00104         process_t* ret = (process_t*) malloc(sizeof(process_t));
00105         memset(ret, 0, sizeof(process_t));
00106         strcpy(ret->m_Name, "KernelProcess");
00107 
00108         ret->m_ID = 0;
00109 
00110         extern page_directory_t* kernel_pagedir;
00111         ret->m_pageDir = kernel_pagedir;
00112 
00113         ret->m_executionDirectory = init_vfs();
00114 
00115         kernel_proc = ret;
00116 
00117         init_used_list(kernel_proc);
00118 
00119         ret->m_pTerminal = g_kernelTerminal;
00120 
00121         return ret;
00122 }

00124 void freeProcess(process_t* process)
00125 {
00126         //This kills the used list and frees every used page
00127         while (process->m_usedListLocation != 0)
00128         {
00129 
00130                 MEM_LOC top = used_list_top(process);
00131                 freeFrame(top);
00132                 used_list_remove(process, top);
00133         }
00134 
00135         if (process->m_usedListRoot != 0)
00136         {
00137                 free(process->m_usedListRoot);
00138         }
00139 
00140         //Empty the post box
00141         while (process->m_processPostbox.first != 0)
00142         {
00143                 
00144                 postbox_top(&process->m_processPostbox);
00145 
00146         }
00147 
00148         free(process);
00149 
00150         DEBUG_PRINT("A process was freed\n");
00151 
00152 }

00154 int kfork()
00155 {
00156         uint32 esp, ebp;
00157         
00158         disable_interrupts();
00159 
00160         DEBUG_PRINT("Free frames at start %x\n", calculate_free_frames());
00161 
00162         //Store this for later use
00163         process_t* parent = getCurrentProcess();
00164 
00165         //Create a process space for the new process and null iyt
00166         process_t* new_process = malloc(sizeof(process_t));
00167         memset(new_process, 0, sizeof(process_t));
00168 
00169         //Give it a generic name fo-now
00170         strcpy(new_process->m_Name, "ChildProcess");
00171 
00172         new_process->m_pTerminal = parent->m_pTerminal;
00173         init_used_list(new_process);
00174 
00175         //Set the processes unique ID
00176         next_pid++;
00177         new_process->m_ID = next_pid;
00178 
00179         //Located in virt_mm.c
00180         extern page_directory_t* current_pagedir;
00181 
00182         //Set the root execution directory
00183         new_process->m_executionDirectory = parent->m_executionDirectory;
00184 
00185         //Copy the page directory
00186         page_directory_t* newprocesspd = copyPageDir(current_pagedir, new_process);
00187 
00188         //Give it a page directory
00189         new_process->m_pageDir = newprocesspd;
00190 
00191         uint32 current_eip = read_eip();
00192 
00193         if (parent->m_ID == getCurrentProcess()->m_ID)
00194         {
00195                 asm volatile("mov %%esp, %0" : "=r"(esp));
00196                 asm volatile("mov %%ebp, %0" : "=r"(ebp));
00197 
00198                 new_process->esp = esp;
00199                 new_process->ebp = ebp;
00200                 new_process->eip = current_eip;
00201 
00202                 schedulerAdd(new_process);
00203 
00204                 return 0; //Return 0 - Parent
00205         }
00206         else
00207         {
00208                 return 1; //Return 1 - Child
00209         }
00210 }

00212 int createNewProcess(const char* Filename, fs_node_t* Where)
00213 {
00214         uint32 esp, ebp;
00215         
00216         disable_interrupts();
00217 
00218         DEBUG_PRINT("PROCESS: FREE FRAMES AT START 0x%x\n", calculate_free_frames());
00219 
00220         //Store this for later use
00221         process_t* parent = schedulerGetProcessFromPid(0);
00222 
00223         //Create a process space for the new process and null it
00224         process_t* new_process = malloc(sizeof(process_t));
00225         memset(new_process, 0, sizeof(process_t));
00226 
00227         //Give it a generic name fo-now
00228         strcpy(new_process->m_Name, "New Process");
00229 
00230         //Setup terminal bindings
00231         new_process->m_pTerminal = parent->m_pTerminal;
00232 
00233         //Initialize the used frames list for the process
00234         init_used_list(new_process);
00235 
00236         //Set the processes unique ID
00237         next_pid++;
00238         new_process->m_ID = next_pid;
00239 
00240         //Located in virt_mm.c
00241         extern page_directory_t* current_pagedir;
00242         extern page_directory_t* kernel_pagedir;
00243 
00244         //Set the root execution directory
00245         new_process->m_executionDirectory = parent->m_executionDirectory;
00246 
00247         DEBUG_PRINT("PROCESS: CREATING PAGE DIR\n");
00248 
00249         //Copy the page directory
00250         page_directory_t* newprocesspd = copyPageDir(kernel_pagedir, new_process);
00251 
00252         DEBUG_PRINT("PROCESS: PAGE DIR CREATED\n");
00253 
00254         //Give it a page directory
00255         new_process->m_pageDir = newprocesspd;
00256 
00257         uint32 current_eip = new_process_entry;
00258 
00259         asm volatile("mov %%esp, %0" : "=r"(esp));
00260         asm volatile("mov %%ebp, %0" : "=r"(ebp));
00261 
00262         new_process->esp = USER_STACK_START;
00263         new_process->ebp = USER_STACK_START;
00264         new_process->eip = current_eip;
00265 
00266         process_message InfomaticMessage;
00267         InfomaticMessage.from_PID = 0;
00268         InfomaticMessage.ID = LOAD_MESSAGE;
00269         InfomaticMessage.messageAdditionalData = make_orders(Filename, Where);
00270 
00271         postbox_add(&new_process->m_processPostbox, InfomaticMessage);
00272 
00273         schedulerAdd(new_process);
00274 
00275         DEBUG_PRINT("RETURN\n");
00276 
00277         return 0; //Return 0 - Parent
00278 }

00280 void rename_current_process(const char* Str)
00281 {
00282         set_process_name(getCurrentProcess(), Str);

00284 
00285 inline void switch_process(process_t* from, process_t* to)
00286 {
00287         if (!from || !to) return; //Invalid ptrs?
00288         disable_interrupts();
00289 
00290         uint32 esp, ebp, eip;
00291 
00292         asm volatile("mov %%esp, %0" : "=r"(esp));
00293         asm volatile("mov %%ebp, %0" : "=r"(ebp));
00294 
00295         eip = read_eip();
00296 
00297         if (eip == 0x12345) //Just switched tasks?
00298         {
00299                 return; //Return to whence you came!
00300         }
00301 
00302         from->eip = eip;
00303         from->esp = esp;
00304         from->ebp = ebp;
00305 
00306         eip = to->eip;
00307         esp = to->esp;
00308         ebp = to->ebp;
00309         page_directory_t* pagedir = to->m_pageDir;
00310 
00311         extern page_directory_t* current_pagedir;
00312         current_pagedir = pagedir;
00313 
00314         asm volatile("cli; \
00315                       mov %1, %%esp; \
00316                       mov %2, %%ebp; \
00317                       mov %0, %%ecx; \
00318                       mov %3, %%cr3; \
00319                       mov $0x12345, %%eax; \
00320                       sti; \
00321                       jmp *%%ecx;" :: "r" (eip), "r" (esp), "r" (ebp), "r" (pagedir));
00322 
00323         return;
00324 }
00325 
00326 //Jump to the next process
00327 inline void jump_process(process_t* to)
00328 {
00329         if (!to) return; //Invalid ptrs?
00330         disable_interrupts();
00331 
00332         uint32 esp, ebp, eip;
00333 
00334         eip = to->eip;
00335         esp = to->esp;
00336         ebp = to->ebp;
00337 
00338         page_directory_t* pagedir = to->m_pageDir;
00339 
00340         extern page_directory_t* current_pagedir;
00341         current_pagedir = pagedir;
00342 
00343         asm volatile("cli; \
00344                       mov %1, %%esp; \
00345                       mov %2, %%ebp; \
00346                       mov %0, %%ecx; \
00347                       mov %3, %%cr3; \
00348                       mov $0x12345, %%eax; \
00349                       sti; \
00350                       jmp *%%ecx;" :: "r" (eip), "r" (esp), "r" (ebp), "r" (pagedir));
00351 
00352         return;
00353 }
00354 
00355 process_message postbox_top(process_postbox* pb)
00356 {
00357         if (pb->first == 0)
00358         {
00359                 process_message ret;
00360                 ret.ID = -1; //-1 = No messages left to read
00361                 return ret;
00362         }
00363 
00364         postbox_message_entry* message = pb->first;
00365 
00366         if (pb->first->next != 0)
00367         {
00368                 pb->first = message->next;
00369         } else
00370         {
00371                 pb->first = 0;
00372         }
00373 
00374         process_message ret = message->data;
00375         free(message);
00376 
00377         return ret;
00378 }
00379 
00380 //Get the top message without removing it
00381 process_message postbox_peek(process_postbox* pb)
00382 {
00383         if (pb->first == 0)
00384         {
00385                 process_message ret;
00386                 ret.ID = -1; //-1 = No messages left to read
00387                 return ret;
00388         }
00389 
00390         return pb->first->data;
00391 }

00393 void set_process_name(process_t* proc, const char* Name)
00394 {
00395         strcpy(proc->m_Name, Name);
00396 }
00397 
00398 void postbox_add(process_postbox* pb, process_message msg)
00399 {
00400         if (pb->first == 0)
00401         {
00402                 //Create pb->first
00403                 postbox_message_entry* new_entry = malloc(sizeof(postbox_message_entry));
00404                 new_entry->data = msg;
00405                 new_entry->next = 0;
00406 
00407                 pb->first = new_entry;
00408         }
00409         else
00410         {
00411                 //Add to the end of the list
00412                 postbox_message_entry* last = pb->first;
00413 
00414                 //Find the last entry
00415                 while (1)
00416                 {
00417                         if (last->next == 0)
00418                         {
00419                                 break;
00420                         } else
00421                         {
00422                                 last = last->next;
00423                         }
00424                 }
00425 
00426                 postbox_message_entry* new_entry = malloc(sizeof(postbox_message_entry));
00427                 new_entry->data = msg;
00428                 new_entry->next = 0;
00429 
00430                 last->next = new_entry;         
00431         }
00432 }
